org.opentcs.drivers

Interface VehicleControllerPool


  • public interface VehicleControllerPool
    Maintains associations between vehicles and vehicle controllers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getSimulationTimeFactor()
      Returns the current time factor for simulation.
      VehicleController getVehicleController(java.lang.String vehicleName)
      Returns the vehicle controller associated with the vehicle with the given name, or null, if no vehicle controller is associated with it or if there is no vehicle with the given name.
      void setSimulationTimeFactor(double factor)
      Sets a time factor for simulation.
      void terminate()
      Unregisters, unbinds and terminates this pool instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getVehicleController

        VehicleController getVehicleController(java.lang.String vehicleName)
        Returns the vehicle controller associated with the vehicle with the given name, or null, if no vehicle controller is associated with it or if there is no vehicle with the given name.
        Parameters:
        vehicleName - The name of the vehicle for which to return the vehicle controller.
        Returns:
        the vehicle controller associated with the vehicle with the given name, or null, if no vehicle controller is associated with it or if there is no vehicle with the given name.

      • getSimulationTimeFactor

        double getSimulationTimeFactor()
        Returns the current time factor for simulation.
        Returns:
        The current time factor for simulation.

      • setSimulationTimeFactor

        void setSimulationTimeFactor(double factor)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets a time factor for simulation.
        Parameters:
        factor - The time factor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given value is 0.0 or smaller.

      • terminate

        void terminate()
        Unregisters, unbinds and terminates this pool instance.
